response.overview: An assassin is hired to kill a wife and her husband, but somehow they seem to know he's after them, and lure him into a tiny room with another assassin set to kill him, so The original assassin tries to talk his way out of it, and even convince him to help him kill the family. He succeeds in one of those areas, but it turns out he needs to go back, find him and make him agree to all of it
response.tagline: The job was simple... Until he became the target.
response.title: Terms and Execution
